string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format

string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format_use

string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_range

string.name: mtrl_picker_out_of_range

string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_selected

string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_title

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_unselected

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for month. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_month_abbr

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for year. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_year_abbr

When enabled, annotations can be filtered by author, type, color and review status.
When enabled, visual color will be enhanced, but loading performance will be affected.
When enabled, top toolbar and side navigation drawer will be shown at all time.
When enabled, JavaScript actions embedded in PDF files will be executed.
When enabled, the number of tabs is unlimited.
When enabled, system\'s night mode setting will affect the app theme upon restart.
When enabled, the zoom level will not change when you turn pages horizontally.
When enabled, the page number will be shown when turning pages.
When enabled, vertical scrolling will snap to page.
You can change scrolling direction by clicking the [gear] button.

Flattening the annotation will make it a permanent part of the PDF, so that it cannot be modified or removed by standard viewing software. This can be undone during this session, however cannot be undone once the document is closed.

Failed to save: file is locked for writing
You can use the space below to draw you signature, or just click the \"Pick image…\" button to use an image instead.

By clicking "Sign and Save" the document will be digitally signed using a pre-existent certificate and password, and saved. If you prefer to just add the signature to the field and digitally sign it later, click \"Use Appearance\". Using just the appearance will allow you to further change the thickness and color of the signature.
